t: How*pn happy is the one who does not walk*ln in the advice of the wicked or*ln stand in the pathway with sinners or*ln sit in the company of mockers!
Instead,*ln his delight is in the Lordâ€™s*s instruction, and*ln he meditates on it day and night.
He*ln is like a tree planted beside flowing streams that*ln bears its fruit in its season, and*ln its leaf does not wither. Whatever*ln he does prospers.
The*pn wicked are not like this; instead,*ln they are like chaff that the wind blows away.
Therefore*ln the wicked will not stand up in the judgment, nor*ln sinners in the assembly of the righteous.
For*pn the Lord*s watches over the way of the righteous, but*ln the way of the wicked leads to ruin.
